summary.span: 提供 对象的强类型化集合，并实现 接口以支持在该集合中进行导航。

span.span: Provides a strongly typed collection for objects and implements the interface to support navigating through the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类提供了有关的强类型的集合对象。The class provides a strongly typed collection for objects. 它将存储内部中从零开始的数组的对象。It stores objects internally in a zero-based array. 您可以修改集合时创建的第一个，然后使用以下方法来添加、 复制和删除对象：You can modify a collection when it is first created, and then use the following methods to add, copy, and remove objects: - 若要添加对象，请使用， ，和方法。To add objects, use the , , and methods. - 若要将复制对象，请使用方法。To copy objects, use the method. - 若要删除对象，请使用方法。To remove objects, use the method. 您可以创建一个只读，该集合不允许添加、 复制和移除对象，使用静态方法。You can create a read-only , which does not permit adding, copying, nor removing objects, by using the static method. 返回的集合并方法是只读的按原样时所返回上访问属性从返回的对象提供程序。The collections that are returned by the and methods are read-only, as is the that is returned when the property is accessed on a object that is returned from a provider. 一个引发异常，如果你试图修改只读的通过设置的默认索引器属性或通过使用任何以下方法：A exception is thrown, if you attempt to modify a read-only by setting the default indexer property or by using any of the following methods: - - - - - - 使用属性检查之前调用上述列表中的任何一种方法的集合。Use the property to check the collection before calling any of the methods in the preceding list. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建集合，然后添加对象使用与其方法。The following code example demonstrates how to create a collection, and then add objects to it using the method. 是当前站点图，显示前两个层次结构级别的子集。The is a subset of the current site map, showing only the first two hierarchical levels. [!code-csharp[System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection_2#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection_2/CS/webform2smccs.aspx#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection_2#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection_2/VB/webform2smcvb.aspx#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 无法添加对象为只读的或固定大小集合。You cannot add a object to a read-only or fixed-size collection. 你可以测试是否是只读的通过检查属性。You can test whether a is read-only by checking the property. ## Examples 本部分包含两个代码示例。This section contains two code examples. 第一个代码示例演示如何创建一个新集合并向其中添加元素。The first code example demonstrates how to create a new collection and add elements to it. 第二个代码示例演示如何将元素添加到自定义的站点地图提供程序。The second code example demonstrates how to add elements to a custom site map provider. 下面的代码示例演示如何使用构造函数创建一个新，然后将元素添加到其与方法。The following code example demonstrates how to use the constructor to create a new , and then add elements to it with the method. [!code-csharp[System.Web.SiteMapNode_2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.SiteMapNode_2/CS/sitemapnode2acs.aspx.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.SiteMapNode_2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.SiteMapNode_2/VB/sitemapnode2avb.aspx.vb#1)] 下面的代码示例演示了一个自定义站点映射提供程序实现，并演示如何使用构造函数创建一个新并将元素添加到与方法。The following code example demonstrates a custom site map provider implementation and shows how to use the constructor to create a new and add elements to the with the method. 此代码示例摘自一个更大的代码示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger code example provided for the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用索引器来循环访问的内容集合，或替换中指定索引处的对象。You can use the indexer to iterate over the contents of a collection or to replace the object at a specified index. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用索引器来检索对象从集合。The following code example demonstrates how to use the indexer to retrieve a object from the collection. 在此示例中，位置中的第二个元素的内部数组使用删除对象方法并追加到数组，该数组方法。In this example, a object is removed from its position at the second element of the internal array using the method and is appended to the array with the method. 要插入对象指定索引处，请改为将它追加到数组末尾的使用方法。To insert a object at a specific index, instead of appending it to the end of the array, use the method. remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以测试是否集合是只读的通过检查属性。You can test whether a collection is read-only by checking the property. 属性也会返回`true`时是只读的。The property also returns `true` when a is read-only. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来测试是否集合是只读的还是可修改。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to test whether a collection is read-only or modifiable. 如果`siteNodes`是可修改，`MoveNode`对其调用; 否则为克隆使用的创建`siteNodes`作为基。If `siteNodes` is modifiable, `MoveNode` is called on it; otherwise, a clone is created, using `siteNodes` as a base. [!code-csharp[System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection_1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection_1/CS/webform1smccs.aspx#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection_1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection_1/VB/webform1smcvb.aspx#1)]

span.span: A read-only collection supports read and search operations, but does not support the , , , , , and methods, nor the setter on the default indexer property, .

span.span: An object that can be used to synchronize access to the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 枚举集合本质上不是线程安全的过程。Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread safe procedure. 即使是同步的其他线程仍可以修改，这将导致枚举器引发异常。Even when a is synchronized, other threads can still modify the , which causes the enumerator to throw an exception. 若要确保枚举过程线程安全性，您可以锁定在整个枚举期间或者捕获由其他线程所做的更改导致的异常。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes that are made by other threads.
